metadata.Title: CVE-2018-16472 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.Description:
A prototype pollution attack in cached-path-relative versions <=1.0.1allows an attacker to inject properties on Object.prototype which are theninherited by all the JS objects through the prototype chain causing a DoSattack.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-16472` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

node-cached-path-relative - 1.0.2-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: node-cached-path-relative package in jammy, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.0.2-1').
